title: TVS Motor unveils TVS Apache RTR 160 Racing Edition at Rs 1.28 lakh
description: The TVS Apache 2024 RTR 160 Racing Edition, priced at Rs 1.28 lakh (ex-showroom Delhi), features a matte black color, red alloy wheels, ride modes, an LCD cluster, and LED lamps. Vimal Sumbly highlighted its engineering excellence. Backed by 5.5 million riders, it's now available for booking. Business - Premium head emphasized state-of-the-art technology reflecting TVS heritage.
